meanings.definition: A representation of the external form of a person or thing in art.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed beautiful images of animals on the walls.
meanings.sent2: She loved to paint colorful images of flowers in her art class.
meanings.sent3: The artist's images of dancing elephants brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination created vivid images of fairies dancing in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The photographer captured stunning images of the sunset over the ocean.

meanings.sent1: His mind was filled with images of his childhood home.
meanings.sent2: The book painted vivid images of faraway lands in her mind.
meanings.sent3: The image of a talking dog in a suit made her giggle.
meanings.sent4: The concept of time as a river flowing created a powerful image in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The memory of her grandmother's warm hugs was a comforting image in her thoughts.

meanings.definition: A physical likeness or representation of a person or thing, photographed, painted, sculptured, or otherwise made visible.
meanings.sent1: The family portrait captured the images of three generations together.
meanings.sent2: The artist sculpted images of mythical creatures out of clay.
meanings.sent3: The image of a cat wearing sunglasses in the painting made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an image of pure joy that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The statue in the park depicted images of freedom and unity.
